descriptionNullable:
**TuSimple-Benchmark**

The TuSimple dataset consists of 6,408 road images on US highways. The resolution of the image is 1280×720. The dataset is composed of 3,626 for training, 358 for validation, and 2,782 for testing called the TuSimple test set of which the images are under different weather conditions.
This is the full version of the TUSimple Dataset along with the extra training Segmentation Annotations

[Paper: End-to-End Lane Marker Detection via Row-wise Classification](https://arxiv.org/abs/2005.08630)
[Papers with code](https://paperswithcode.com/dataset/tusimple)
title: TuSimple
subtitle: Ace the Lane Detection Challenge
